import "./home.css" import{Link} from 'react-router-dom' import _default from "react-bootstrap/esm/Accordion" import data from './list.json' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min" function Card({item}) { const {id} =useParams; return (
< img src ={require(`${item.image}`).default} className="image" alt = "" />

{item.name}

{item.tag}

) } export default Card
